name: StaticMesh
description: A StaticMesh entity represents a Mesh which can be spawned in the world, can't move and is more optimized for using in decorating the world.

functions.name: GetMesh
functions.description: Gets the Asset path mesh used

functions.name: IsFromLevel
functions.description: Gets if this StaticMesh is from the Level

return.description: if this StaticMesh is from the level
